column1: Drennon Davis, Hampton Yount, Guy Branum, Deanne Smith, and more comedians that should be way more known than they are currently are featured in the trailer for the new season of Last Comic Standing premiering May 22nd on NBC.
Hopefully, they make it to being a finalist. Watch the trailer here. UPDATE: trailer is currently not available from NBC for some reason, but we swear what we said was true
Last Comic Standing Yay I like that show! glad it’s back
